name: Mechanical Wings (Droyne)
description:
Simple, lightweight frameworks with fabric or plastic that will increase the wing span and surface area. Mechanical wings allow flight on worlds up to two sizes larger than usual atmosphere-based limits (standard atmosphere, up to world size 7; dense atmosphere, up to world size 9).

al- low flight on worlds up to two sizes larger than usual atmosphere-based limits (standard atmosphere, up to world size 7; dense atmosphere, up to world size 9).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
